content: from * to last * to end foll - following 17 17 17 19 19 19 sts p1 0 0 1 1 1 a 2nd row * k1a p1a repeat from * to last g - grammes k16 17 17 18 18 18 b 3 sts p3b in - inch es 14th row p17 18 18 19 19 19 b k0 1 3rd row k4b k1a * p1a k1a repeat from increase - increase ing 1 0 0 0 a * p1a k1a repeat from * to end * to end k - knit 15th row * k1a p1a repeat from * to last 19 4th row * p1a k1a repeat from * to last mm - millimetres 19 19 21 21 21 sts k0 0 0 1 1 1 a 5 5 5 7 7 7 sts p0 0 0 1 1 1 a p5 5 5 6 0 - no stitches times or row k19 19 19 20 20 20 b 6 6 b p - purl 5th row k6 7 7 7 7 7 b p1 0 0 0 0 0 a 16th row p20 20 21 22 22 22 b p1 1 patt - pattern * k1a p1a repeat from * to end 0 1 1 1 a * k1a p1a repeat from * to end rem - remain ing 6th row * k1a p1a repeat from * to last from 1st to 16th row sets position of double repeat - repeat 9 sts k1a p8b moss-st double moss stitch in a and st-st rs - right side 7th row k9 9 9 10 10 10 b k0 0 0 1 stocking stitch in b st s - stitch es 1 1 a * p1a k1a repeat from * to end keeping continuity of double moss-st in a decrease - together 8th row * p1a k1a repeat from * to last and st-st in b proceed as follows - ws - wrong side 11 sts p1 1 0 0 0 0 a p10 10 11 11 m1 - pick up loop between last and next 11 11 b for 2nd size only stitch and knit into the back of this loop 9th row k11 12 12 12 12 12 b p0 1 1 work 1 row working 2 sts less in double 1 1 1 a * k1a p1a repeat from * to end moss-st and 2 sts more in st-st tips & techniques 10th row * k1a p1a repeat from * to last intarsia technique 13 13 13 15 15 15 sts k0 0 0 1 1 1 a when working with different balls of yarn for 1st 2nd 4th 5th and p13 13 13 14 14 14 b the colour to be used should be twisted 6th sizes only 11th row k14 14 14 15 15 15 b k1 round the colour just used to link the work 4 3 2 2 2 row working 1 st less in 1 1 0 0 0
